entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • <input> tag helper inserting hidden element with name __Invariant #60723
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #60722
  • Precompiled views fetching not working on .NET 8 for MVC views #60726
  • Multi-threading exception System.InvalidOperationException in the BlazorWebAppMovies sample (re: Blazor + QuickGrid + EF Core) #60721
  • [10.0-preview.1] ASP.NET `RouteHandlerAnalyzer` - `System.IndexOutOfRangeException` #60719
  • [Blazor] Update AuthenticationStateProvider to take advantage of Declarative persistent component state #60718
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Proposal: Introduce a [DiLogger] attribute for automatic logger injection #60717
  • [Blazor] Support serialization extensibility for declarative persistent component state #60716
    .NET 10 Planning
  • SignInAsync doesn't call SignInOrTwoFactorAsync #60712
  • Kestrel inconsistent certificate chain handling between endpoint and default configuration #60709
  • System.NotSupportedException: No data is available for encoding 1252 in .NET Core #60706
  • Blazor two-way bindings affecting incorrect binding object reference #60704

Closed

  • Perf regression: mvc #60707
  • Support registering OpenApiOperationTransformer via extension method for Minimal APIs #59180
    10.0-preview3
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #60708
  • Perf regression: json #60684
  • enhancednavigationstart Prevent Default does not work #60705

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some issues surrounding PublicTopLevelProgramGenerator.cs #60727
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Support forwarded headers in servers URL resolution #60725
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Support input validation for minimal APIs via generic resolver model #60724
    area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Flow the environment from Server to WebAssembly through SSR marker #60714
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview3
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25153.3 #60713
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix: Inconsistent certificate chain handling between endpoint and default configuration #60710
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • 1es-ify Localization pipeline #60720
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Add support for ServerSentEventsResult and extension methods #60616
    area-minimal, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi to the webapiaot template (with an optional flag to disable it) #60337
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Initial support for persisting component state #60634
    area-blazor
